DDL Generator

Packages
org.castor.ddl This package contains functional classes, exceptions and Main class for DDL generator
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.db2 This package contains final classes to create DDL for Db2
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.derby This package contains final classes to create DDL for Derby
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.hsql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Hsql
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.mssql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Microsoft SQL Server
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.mysql This package contains final classes to create DDL for MySQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.oracle This package contains final classes to create DDL for Oracle
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.pointbase This package contains final classes to create DDL for PointBase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.postgresql This package contains final classes to create DDL for PostgreSQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.sapdb This package contains final classes to create DDL for SapDB
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.engine.sybase This package contains final classes to create DDL for Sybase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.keygenerator  
org.castor.ddl.schemaobject This package contains SchemaObject for ddl creation including Table, Field, KeyGenerator, Index, Schema and KeyRepository.
org.castor.ddl.typeinfo This package contains various types' definition.
